processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section alleghenienses;species pugnax;

treatment.description: Differing from coarser states of no. 154 in having the lower half of the glabrous primocanes with crowded or confluent subdeltoid hard prickles, the larger ones 5-9 mm. broad at base; petioles, petiolules and midribs (beneath) of primocane-foliage copiously prickly, the margins of the leaflets with mostly simple teeth; racemes 0.5-1 dm. long.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Upland pastures, Hartford Co., Ct.; reports from e. Mass. to centr.-w. N.Y. need confirmation.
